findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow unauthorized upgrades to its scripts.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls
findings.description: The functions transfer, approve, transferFrom, increaseAllowance, decreaseAllowance, excludeFromReward, includeInReward, removeFromBlackList, setExcludedFromFee, setMaxTx, setMinTokenBalance, setAntiWhaleEnabled, setExcludedFromAntiWhale, setExcludedFromBuy, setExcludedFromMaxTx, setAntiWhaleThreshold, and setFeesTransfer are not properly protected.

findings.title: Low security risk in Buy Back function
findings.description: A low-security risk exists in the Buy Back function, allowing the project to buy back its tokens from existing holders usually at a market price.

findings.title: Unprotected minting of tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.
